Description:
JB180222/10-33 - 312287292 - You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely welding fume, which is a known carcinogen, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

JB180222/11-33 - 312287334 - You have failed to provide suitable health surveillance for employees who are, or are liable to be exposed to substances hazardous to health, namely metalworking fluids which can cause occupational dermatitis and stainless steel welding fume which can cause lung disease.

JB040222/04-33 - 312287381 - You have failed to adequately guard the dangerous parts of the radial arm drill to prevent entanglement.

JB040222/06-33 - 312287408 - You do not have suitable measures in place to use emery cloth in a safe manner to prevent entanglement and manage risk.

JB040222/05-33 - 312287472 - You have failed to adequately guard the dangerous parts of the horizontal milling machine to prevent entanglement.
